name: Kre-chan the Mole
description:
You can get stuck in few places, sorry. 

If it happens, You can respawn by killing yourself with F11. Yes, it does work though it gets weird, for example chrome will force you out of the fullscreen:/ You can do it another way - F4 to quit fullscreen, F11 to die, F4 to go back fullscreen. Yeah I know its crap. Sorry.

For example: You can get stuck after the mole village. To not get stuck get a powerup, just look for a hidden corridor on your right. behind a huge pillar in the first room after the village. Take the power up and you won't get stuck. But F11 should also work anyway.

Made for Metroidvania Month 17 game jam.

Game does not feature saves, but it should be completable in first playthrough in about 20-30 minutes.  I hope. You can see a brief walkthrough at the bottom. Fullscreen/mouse capture may glitch a bit in browser, but click a few times and it should be grabbed by game. Be prepared for few bugs eh. You can skip many things by design, probably too many - but in the end You have to get all powerups and do one quest.

I am also quite ashamed, but the game is very unoptimized, sorry. It featured lights at some point, but I decided to turn them off. The game will probably run better in smaller resolution (like in window).

Controls: WASD/left analog - move
mouse/right analog- look around
SPACE/A button - jump
Left mouse buttom/X button - action (interact, talk, fight, etc.)
ESC/ENTER/Start - pause

4 gears collected will give You another life bar.

Made in godot. Almost all made by me using blender/krita/inkscape/many sheets of paper.  Sounds from https://opengameart.org/

There are few issues with animations still, and You can probably fell outside of map in few places. You can press F11 if You get stuck to die and respawn.

Turns out making a 3d game by hand takes an awful lot of time and I had to scrap a lot of things. And not working for the first two weekends due to other plans is... very unfortunate. But its more or less complete so hey, its something.

If You get lost, feel free to ask in comments.

Brief walkthrough: Mines -> Get Gloves -> Construction site -> Get double jump -> Extinguish fire in greenish map -> Get rope -> Mines, check lava waterfall, actually the place where you get the first power up (see screenshots, there's a ring there) -> Construction site -> Surface
